name: Bancho & Will
description:
Bancho & Will is little more than an engine test we made for the 64 Digits Spring Competition, it is a single level, and not a very long one at that. The game ends once you touch the boss at the end.

CONTROLS

Z - Jump

X - Attack

ENTER - Start, pause

"100/10 it's okay I guess, the font was great." - AHGold

-TEAM CREDITS-

BiSWaldmann - Game Design, Graphics, Code

AHGold - Font, Game Design and Code Support

Anything9k - Music, Sound Effects

Made in Game Maker
